subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The dismissal of Rodgers, who had been in charge of the club for three years, came after a 1-1 Premier League draw in the Merseyside derby against Everton.
snippet: The dismissal of Rodgers, who had been in charge of the club for three years, came after a 1-1 Premier League draw in the Merseyside derby against Everton.
